Posted By: Superllama12 (1/13/2011 4:29:13 PM)

posts.post_content:
A vanilla 5/4 for 6. There are a few colored vanilla guys that are better than this, but for straight up colorless mana this is not bad. There are better options ([Wurmcoil Engine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wurmcoil Engine)) with the same CMC and better or equal power/toughness.  
  
Love the art and flavor text. This was one of the first cards I had when I started playing and it is still my favorite flavor text.  
  
~Zuty
posts.html:
A vanilla 5/4 for 6. There are a few colored vanilla guys that are better than this, but for straight up colorless mana this is not bad. There are better options (Wurmcoil Engine) with the same CMC and better or equal power/toughness.

Love the art and flavor text. This was one of the first cards I had when I started playing and it is still my favorite flavor text.

~Zuty
